definition: Reynolds number (ratio of inertial forces to viscous forces in fluid mechanics)

sentences.english: The pulmonary vasculitis and Raynaud phenomenon might be related to immunologic abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 認爲肺血管的病變及雷諾現象可能與免疫異常有關。

sentences.english: Barbara and Raynor stopped dancing and went across to Lucia at the door.
sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉和雷諾停住了跳舞，穿過露西婭走到門邊。

sentences.english: The name of the Russian astronaut who performed this feat was Leonov.
sentences.chinese: 建立這一功績的蘇聯宇航員名叫雷諾夫。

sentences.english: Figure 12. Raynaud disease in a 39-year-old man with cold-induced vasospasm.
sentences.chinese: 雷諾氏病，39歲，男，感冒引起的血管痙攣。

sentences.english: The ranolazine works by blocking what is called delayed inward sodium current.
sentences.chinese: 雷諾嗪的作用機制是阻斷遲發性鈉離子內流。

sentences.english: A Ford or a Renault can be apet. A Toyota is always an appliance.
sentences.chinese: 福特或者雷諾車可以作爲寵物，豐田車則永遠是工具。

sentences.english: Food of all kinds he loved and lavished.
sentences.chinese: 不管什麼樣的食物，雷諾特都珍愛有加。

sentences.english: In the main channel side-slope zone, the Reynolds stresses become particularly complex.
sentences.chinese: 在主槽邊坡區，雷諾應力變化複雜。

sentences.english: The mission contact in the Raynor mission strand is actually a cybernetic adjutant.
sentences.chinese: 觸發吉姆雷諾任務的事實上是他的機器人副官。

sentences.english: Rhino and Mouse are always the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 雷諾與毛斯是最好的朋友。

sentences.english: The Impressionist Renoir is quoted as saying “No shadow is black.
sentences.chinese: 印象派畫家雷諾阿曾言“沒有陰影是黑色的。

sentences.english: Reno had authorized a pre-dawn raid on the great-uncles house by federal officials.
sentences.chinese: 雷諾已經授權聯邦官員在黎明前強行進入埃連舅公家。

sentences.english: By the first light of next morning, Grenouille had a new plan.
sentences.chinese: 第二天晨曦初現，格雷諾耶就有了新的計劃。

sentences.english: Renault declined to comment on Mr. de Montbrial's statement.
sentences.chinese: 雷諾拒絕就德蒙布里亞爾的說法置評。

sentences.english: He kept his car parallel and did not allow the Renault a way out.
sentences.chinese: 他保持自己的車平行駕駛不讓那雷諾車有出去的路。

sentences.english: Hi, this is Sharon in Mr. Reynolds's office.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我是雷諾德先生辦公室的莎倫。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
Snow (name)/Edgar Snow (1905-1972), American journalist, reported from China 1928-1941, author of Red Star Over China
